QuestData.Title: Preemptive Strike
QuestData.Description: These plans document what appears to be an imminent attack on Southshore. The naga of the Eastern Strand are planning to take over the town now that the Alliance has been pushed out.$B$BNot if you can help it!$B$BKill all of the naga on the Eastern Strand and report to Helcular at the Ruins of Southshore with the Daggerspine attack plan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill any 15 Naga at the Eastern Strand.
QuestData.RewardText: HAH! Those naga have some balls on them! To think that they could take Southshore from us in our own territory! Such a preposterous notion.$B$B<Helcular laughs.>$B$BYou have done well to thwart their attack - though I do wonder if they could have survived for even a minute in the blight.
